experience.title: CEO
experience.description: Corporate and Management Consulting (Real Estate and Digital Technology)- Charting out Revenue Goalsheets with Leadership.- Developing strategic Roadmaps.- Drawing comprehensive Execution Layouts, SOP's and Tools to automate.- To hire, train and help create a robust muti-departmental workforce.- Oversee all Operations + external Liasoning.- Design Governance Models for go-to Marketplaces.- Legacy system modernization.- End to end implementation.- Create a successful running model.- Conceive and enforce micro and macro strategies.- Help develop Seamless interoperability between departments, focusing on one vision and culture amongst internal and external stakeholders.- Conduct performance Audits, infrastructure Planning, protocol Design, platform Migrations.- Board review, implement fresh charter, scale up, create parallel models for clients.

recommendations: Gurmeet Singh “Utsav is an extremely professional, supportive and a logical individual. His innovative ideas and his ability to think out of the box makes it a joy work with and learn from him. He is one of those rare leaders who also naturally serves as an inspiring mentor for all who work for him. The kind of expertise he has with work, with his Business and Tech background is immense. He spreads his knowledge and experience amongst peers and team members. Although he's a hardcore businessman, his unique ability is empathy. His capability to motivate a team to care for the project at hand enables him to achieve what's seen as unachievable. Utsav is the go-to person for conflict resolution and problem solving. He's never the one to draw attention to himself and is a total team player. His positive attitude at tough times further add to why he is so respected. Having first hand experience of working with him, I highly recomend him professionally.”

Pritam Biswas “Utsav is a focused, result driven, passionate business leader. He stays ahead of global trends. Will recommend him to any corporation that's requires his consulting services in emerging technologies.”

honors_and_awards.description: A family award initiated by Mrs. Swaroop Dar, my mother, for 'Excellence in Science', Middle School Level. Every 'Annual Recognition Day', the Shivapuri - Dar Award- is given to the best student in Science for the Academic year.
